message: I think a 55/45 split is more fair, considering the inflation will affect your share more than mine in the following rounds.
Considering the inflation, I'll make a small concession, 58% is the lowest I'll go for now
I'm willing to increase my share slightly to 5700, but I think it's important to keep the split relatively close for a mutually beneficial outcome.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer, but I'm not going any lower than this
